channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Onton raises $7.5M to expand its AI-powered shopping site beyond furniture
item.description: Onton, which change its name from Deft, is giving users an infinite canvas with AI-powered image generation to nudge them towards making quicker purch...

item.title: Uber and WeRide’s robotaxi service in Abu Dhabi is officially driverless
item.description: The commercial robotaxi service launched last year. Now, the human safety operator is gone.

item.title: The Viral ‘DoorDash Girl’ Saga Unearthed a Nightmare for Black Creators
item.description: A delivery driver posted a TikTok alleging she had been sexually assaulted by a customer. The deepfakes that followed reveal a growing digital blackfa...

item.title: 10 Best Pillows: Tested For Side, Back, and Stomach Sleepers (2025)
item.description: We’ve spent over a year testing the best pillows to support your noggin, whether you snooze on your side, back, or in a tangle of blankets.

item.title: Bug in jury systems used by several US states exposed sensitive personal data
item.description: An easy-to-exploit vulnerability in a jury system made by Tyler Technologies exposed the personally identifiable data of jurors, including names, home...

item.title: Boeing's Next Starliner Flight Will Only Be Allowed to Carry Cargo
item.description: After a high-profile malfunction left two astronauts stranded on the International Space Station, NASA is requiring rigorous testing before humans get...

item.title: What's the Best Red Light Therapy Mask for Your Skin in 2025?
item.description: The LED devices we'd actually buy with our own money.

item.title: The 6 Best Latte Machines for Automatic Espresso Drinks (2025)
item.description: Turn your kitchen into a café with these barista-worthy automatic espresso machines and latte machines.

item.title: YouTube is working on a feature that will fix the messy home feed
item.description: YouTube is experimenting with a new feature that allows users to customize their home feed.

item.title: Why ‘hold forever’ investors are snapping up venture capital ‘zombies’
item.description: An investor explains the "buy, fix, and hold" model employed by Bending Spoons and similar companies that buy distressed startups.
